name: Cybercat Oscilobot
description: Cybercat Oscilobot is a unique robot with a forest green box body and retro console buttons. Its arms and legs are designed like a cat's, allowing it to move with grace and agility. Unfortunately, its screen is broken, but it compensates for this with a protective helmet addon. Cybercat Oscilobot is a member of the WebtrES club, a group of robots who explore the digital realm in search of knowledge and adventure.
